summary: A staff with an enchant that replicates the Effect Alduin has to make it rain Meteors.
descriptionHtml:
-UPDATE- 
I apparently left some stuff out of the enchantment effect... my bad. I fixed it :) 
Hopefully it works now.. Fingers crossed. Give me feed back please, I really appreciate it.
I still have plans to add a quest a re-balance the staff.
-UPDATE OVER-

This Mod Is A WIP/Beta and and may contain bugs, and or not work quite yet. Let me know if it doesn\'t work, and Endorse if it does! It DOES REQUIRE the mod I am about to mention.

This mod aims to add a staff to the game which replicates the Meteor Storm Alduin uses. It is based of the mod: Spell Tome - Apocalypse v2 by Mass Carade. Here is a link to that mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10147

The staff is located in the Riverwood Trader. I do have some plans for this mod later on (A quest of Sorts, maybe a more balanced version of the staff.) So i need to know if it works. I cannot play Skyrim right now to test it out, but I can in a month or so, my game disk broke and I\'m saving for a new one.

NOTE- This is the second mod I have uploaded. I\'m still trying to figure out the CK. If you have Ideas/Suggestions/ or just want to help please leave a comment or PM me. 
DOUBLE NOTE- here\'s a link to my other mod:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13301
author: Redman97
